code: import{useEffect}from"react";import Lenis from"@studio-freight/lenis";export var useSmoothScroll=function useSmoothScroll(){useEffect(function(){var lenis=new Lenis({duration:1.3,easing:function easing(t){return Math.min(1,1.001-Math.pow(2,-10*t));},direction:"vertical",smooth:true});function raf(time){lenis.raf(time);requestAnimationFrame(raf);}requestAnimationFrame(raf);},[]);};
